translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter with Kumuda
The Elder Who Served the Community
“In the time of the Fortunate One Vessabhu,
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of serving (the community).

analyzed: itas te sattame kappe  sattevāsum sama udakā
translated: For seven eons from now,🔽there were seven floods;
The Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus the elder Saṅghupaṭṭhāka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā saṅghupaṭṭhāko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Saṅghupaṭṭhākattherassāpadānaṁ dasamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā saṅghupaṭṭhāko theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati  saṅgha upaṭṭhāka therassa apadānam dasama
translated: The Elder Saṅghupaṭṭhāka’s Birth Story is the tenth.
